hook.text: An AI spots a tumor in an X-ray that two radiologists missed.

buildup.text: CV models analyze X-rays, CT scans, MRIs, and pathology slides for disease detection.

discovery.text: Models trained on millions of scans can match or exceed specialist-level accuracy.

twist.text: Medical data is scarce, private, and expensive to labelâ€”requiring specialized techniques.

climax.text: FDA approval is required before clinical deployment. Accuracy alone isn't enough.

punchline.text: AI assists the doctor. The doctor makes the call.

quiz.question: What is needed beyond accuracy for medical AI deployment?
